attributes.action: Ban hunting altogether, it is very cruel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hunting is very cruel to the animals, even though some people call it a "sport". A sport is a fair game between equal sides, and both sides should be alive by the end!! Some call it "tradition", but that doesn't mean it can't stop. Foxes are a traditional part of our landscape, and give the place a really British look. They eat chickens to survive, just like we do, so we shouldn't kill them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
